spiritsExplanation:
The workout 'Let Go and Row' exhibits characteristics of both 'High-Energy & Intense' and 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirits. The workout description emphasizes action in discomfort, aligning with intense effort and high intensity (3 out of 3), which supports the 'High-Energy & Intense' spirit. The max rhythm of 32 and interval format further suggest a vigorous, demanding session, justifying a score of 0.8 for this spirit. 

The imagery of rowing on a river strongly supports an 'Outdoor & Adventure' spirit. The natural setting, visible through the image, embodies the exploration and environmental engagement typical of this spirit, warranting a score of 0.8. The playlist, featuring energetic dance and global hits, complements the high-energy theme and reinforces the intensity of the workout. Other spirits like 'Flow & Rhythm' and 'Structured & Disciplined' are less applicable due to the workout's free-form emphasis on letting go and adapting to discomfort, rather than precision or smoothness.
